item.title: Ahmedabad to Shamlaji Temple: Complete Pilgrimage Guide
item.description: The Shamlaji Temple, also known as the Shamlaji Vishnu Mandir, is one of Gujarat's most revered pilgrimage sites. Nestled amidst the picturesque Aravalli Hills, the temple is dedicated to Lord Vishnu and attracts thousands of devotees each year. Located about 120 kilometers from Ahmedabad, Shamlaji Temple is a perfect destination for a peaceful spiritual retreat. Here’s a detailed artic
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
